name: 紀集祥
objective:
本課程利用範例文章閱讀、分析訓練學生寫作能力，從段落發展成為完整組織的作文。其中包括標題句、段落、各類文體，並加強句型變化，及高階文法概念。

The purpose of this course is to develop reading and writing skills from paragraph to composition with the modeled samples. The texts include the reading and writing of topic sentence, paragraph development, and the introduction to various styles of composition with a view to reinforce sentences variety and advanced grammatical ideas.
